ygData.msgSnippet: Hi folks, I m new to Heritrix, and am having difficulty crawling a particular site politely . Basically the site itself contains hundreds of subdomains such

Hi folks,

I'm new to Heritrix, and am having difficulty crawling a particu=
lar site "politely".  

Basically the site itself contains hundreds of subd=
omains such as foo.domain.com, bar.domain.com, baz.domain.com etc... the pr=
oblem is that all of these domains point to the same physical host in reali=
ty and the politeness controls such as min-delay-ms treat each of these as =
unique hosts.

Any thoughts on the best way to address this?

Thank you,

-=
 Ian.
